actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to establish a Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security for Management, and for other purposes.
short_title: Homeland Security Management Restructuring Act of 2005
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Homeland Security Management Restructuring Act of 2005 - Amends the Homeland Security Act to establish a Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security for Management, appointed by the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, to serve as the Chief Management Officer and principal advisor to the Secretary of Homeland Security on matters related to management of the Department.

titles.title: Homeland Security Management Restructuring Act of 2005
A bill to establish a Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security for Management, and for other purposes.
